page.title: 08EMPLOYMENT
page.content: EMPLOYMENT. Most people find employment outside the area.There are two distinct categories:- 1.The executive type employees and businessmen tend to commute to London or else to surrounding towns,(Guildford,Farnborough,Farnham). Skilled and unskilled workers also find that they have to go out of the village to work. 2.Those who stay and work within the area are shopkeepers,farmers and farmhands,women doing domestic work, and the self-employed. A few people,like teachers,come into the area to work.Opportunity for employment in the village is slight and those without transport are often unable to obtain employment.During summer months the numerous "pick your own "farms provide casual work.
